name: learna
description: Protecting against hijacking lerna typo installs

scripts.postinstall:
echo "
Whoooaaa!!!
You had a typo in your lerna install. Run 'npm install lerna' instead. You probably also want to run 'npm uninstall learna.
Be careful out there ;) "

author: Will Farley <a.will.farley@gmail.com>
